b.py
====

Enabling bloggers to publish posts in their favorite markup language to Blogger
or WordPress.

Examples
--------

.. code:: sh

  b.py -s blogger post foobar.rst
  b.py -s wordpress post foobar.md

More information
----------------

* PyPI_
